mapper.sql:
FROM Code a WHERE 1=1 AND DelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND seq = #{shValue} AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND codeSeq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND cg_seq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.codeSeq ,a.seq ,a.name ,a.cg_seq ,a.DelNy ,(select name from CodeGroup aa WHERE 1=1 AND a.cg_seq = aa.seq) as codegroupname
ORDER BY a.codeSeq DESC
